header.gameNote: OHIO VALLEY CONF TR AT NASHVILLE TN

article.headline: Samford 38, Tennessee Tech 14
article.story:
COOKEVILLE, Tenn. (AP) -- Cole Stinson threw for 275 yards and
three touchdowns to help Eastern Illinois beat Tennessee Tech 38-14
on Saturday.

Stinson completed 19 of 38 passes, including scoring tosses of
4, 27 and 28 yards, as the Panthers (7-4, 6-1 Ohio Valley
Conference) remained alive in the race for the OVC championship.

With the win, and a loss by UT Martin to Eastern Kentucky
earlier in the day, the Panthers moved into a tie for first place
in the conference standings.

Tennessee Tech (3-7, 3-4) took a quick 7-0 lead when Brent
McNeal caught a 15-yard touchdown pass from Lee Sweeney on the
second play of the game.

Eastern Illinois then reeled off 21-unanswered points on a
Vincent Webb 5-yard run and touchdown catches of 28 and 4 yards by
Micha Rucker, who hauled in six passes for 99 yards.

Bryan Ottrix snagged a 31-yard TD pass from Sweeney with 1:42
remaining in the second quarter as the Golden Eagles trimmed
Eastern Illionois' lead to seven.

The Panthers put the contest away in the second half with 17
unanswered points. Stinson tossed a 27-yard TD pass to Ryan Voss
late in the third period.

Zach Yates, who converted all four extra point attempts, booted
a 37-yard field goal early in the fourth quarter before Norris
Smith, who led Eastern Illinois with 47 yards on 11 carries, capped
the scoring with a 15-yard TD run.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.
